name: magnet-picker
description: Chrome extension for parsing and saving magnet links from specific websites

scripts.build: npm run generate-icons && webpack && npm run copy-static && npm run check-build
scripts.package: npm run build:prod && crx pack dist -o magnet-picker.crx
scripts.dev: npm run build && npm run watch
scripts.copy-static: powershell -Command "New-Item -ItemType Directory -Force -Path dist/content/styles, dist/assets, dist/options, dist/popup; Get-Content src/content/styles/main.css, src/content/styles/base/*.css, src/content/styles/components/*.css, src/content/styles/states/*.css, src/content/styles/toast.css, src/content/styles/scrollbar.css, src/content/styles/animations.css | Set-Content dist/content/styles/index.css; Copy-Item -Force src/manifest.json dist/; Copy-Item -Force src/assets/* dist/assets/; Copy-Item -Force src/options/options.html dist/options/; Copy-Item -Force src/options/options.css dist/options/; Copy-Item -Force src/popup/popup.html dist/popup/; Copy-Item -Force src/popup/popup.css dist/popup/"
